name: David Ramirez
text: The best adaptation of Ender's Game changes everything but does it fantastically anyway. It's Macross Frontier  =P    It's been 20 years since I've read Ender's Game, I think, but just about everything Ender's Game took up as a theme was done in Macross Frontier.    Alien bugs that aren't really hostile.  Almost telepathic connection with the hero(es).  The young recruited early as soldiers.  Manipulative authority.  Mentor types.  Genocide theme.  Leadership/ finding oneself/ maturation in extreme circumstances.
